name: Magistus Saint Aiwass
text:
1 "Magistus" monster + 1 Spellcaster monster
During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other face-up monster on the field; equip this card you control to it. You can only use this effect of "Magistus Saint Aiwass" once per turn. While this card is equipped to an opponent's monster by this effect, that monster cannot activate its effects, also take control of it. A monster equipped with this card gains 1000 ATK/DEF.
